<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Powerful Shove](/Feats.aspx?ID=373) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 146 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Aggressive Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=363) or [Brutish Shove](/Feats.aspx?ID=365)

</column>

---

You can push larger foes around with your attack. You can use Aggressive Block or Brutish Shove against a creature up to two sizes larger than you.

 When a creature you [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) has to stop moving because it would hit an object, it takes damage equal to your Strength modifier (minimum 1). This happens regardless of how you Shoved the creature.
name: Powerful Shove
